Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Maui Sunset in Kihei, you'll be on the beach and minutes from Waipuilani Park, and close to Kalepolepo. This beach condo is within close proximity of Maui Nui Golf Club and Kihei Regional Park.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 225 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and stovetops. Your bed comes with Egyptian cotton sheets, and all rooms are furnished with queen sofa beds. Rooms have private furnished balconies. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, while 32-inch LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including outdoor tennis courts, an outdoor pool, and a sauna. This condo also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and tour/ticket assistance.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, laundry facilities, and an elevator (lift). Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is 11 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Maui Sunset in Kihei, you'll be on the beach and minutes from Waipuilani Park, and close to Kalepolepo. This beach condo is within close proximity of Maui Nui Golf Club and Kihei Regional Park.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Waipuilani Park - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Kalepolepo - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Maui Nui Golf Club - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Kihei Regional Park - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Kalama Beach Park - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Kamaole Beach Park - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Kealia Pond National Wildlife Refuge - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi
Kamaole Beach Park 2 - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Kamaole Beach Park 3 - 4.9 km / 3 mi
Keawakapu Beach - 6.8 km / 4.2 mi
Maui Ocean Center - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi
Maalaea Harbor - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi
Mokapu Beach - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi
Ulua Beach - 7.3 km / 4.6 mi
Ulua Beach Park - 7.4 km / 4.6 mi

The preferred airport for Maui Sunset is Kahului, HI (OGG) - 15.6 km / 9.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Maui Sunset are:
Kahului, HI (OGG) - 15.4 km / 9.6 mi
Kapalua, HI (JHM-West Maui) - 32.2 km / 20 mi

The preferred airport for Maui Sunset is Kahului, HI (OGG).
